mapper.select: select STOCK_REG_SEQ, STOCK_STORE_CD, STOCK_STORE_NM, tp.BRAND_KIND_CD , stk.TF_PRD_CD,stk.TF_PRD_NM,TF_PRD_BARCODE ,PRD_SIZE,REAL_STOCK_CNT , RFID_STOCK_CNT, INVENTORY_CNT, stk.MOD_DATE from ( select * from tf_stock ts where (ts.RFID_STOCK_CNT - ts.REAL_STOCK_CNT) != 0 order by STOCK_REG_SEQ desc limit ${start}, ${size}) as stk left outer join tf_product tp on stk.TF_PRD_CD = tp.TF_PRD_CD

select (select count(*) from tf_input where BT_PRD_BARCODE = 'barcode' and IN_STORE_CD = 'storeCd') as inCnt, (select count(*) from tf_output where BT_PRD_BARCODE = 'barcode' and OUT_STORE_CD = 'storeCd' and substring(ST_OUT_TYPE,1,4) = '0602' ) as outCnt, (select count(*) from tf_output where BT_PRD_BARCODE = 'barcode' and OUT_STORE_CD = 'storeCd' and ST_OUT_TYPE = '060301' ) as stCnt, (select count(*) from tf_output where BT_PRD_BARCODE = 'barcode' and OUT_STORE_CD = 'storeCd' and ST_OUT_TYPE = '060302' ) as onCnt
select * from tf_stock ts where TF_PRD_BARCODE = #{item} limit 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tf_stock_test (STOCK_STORE_CD, STOCK_STORE_NM, TF_PRD_CD, TF_PRD_NM, TF_PRD_BARCODE, PRD_SIZE, CUR_STOCK_CNT, REAL_STOCK_CNT, STD_STOCK_CNT, RFID_STOCK_CNT, INVENTORY_CNT, REG_DATE, REG_ID) VALUES(#{STOCK_STORE_CD}, #{STOCK_STORE_NM}, #{TF_PRD_CD}, #{TF_PRD_NM}, #{TF_PRD_BARCODE}, #{PRD_SIZE}, #{CUR_STOCK_CNT}, #{REAL_STOCK_CNT}, #{STD_STOCK_CNT}, 0, 0, now(), #{userId})
